attributes.action: make all council owned gyms and leisure centres free to enter in a similar fashion as operates for museums. This would have a beneficial impact on the health of the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free access to council owned leisure centres would improve the health of the nation and reduce the unacceptable levels of obesity in the population. It would also have an impact on delinquency in the younger members of society by giving them something constructive to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
